data.oai_dc:dc: (D) Evaluation of DNA damage by alkaline comet assay in Rad9-/- MES cells mock-treated or treated with 0.5 mM N-acetylcysteine under 1G of SMG condition for 1 day. (E) Evaluation of DNA damage by neutral comet assay in Rad9-/- MES cells mock-treated or treated with 0.5 mM N-acetylcysteine under 1G of SMG condition for 1 day.
